body.class: mediawiki ltr ns-6 ns-subject page-File_Flag_of_Germany_svg skin-vector

img.alt: File:Flag of Germany.svg

div.p: Flag_of_Germany.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 1,000 × 600 pixels, file size: 502 B)

This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. Information from its description page there is shown below.
Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

a.title: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

img.alt: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons

a.title: This page is protected against reuploading.

img.alt: This page is protected against reuploading.
FIAV 110100.svg

p.style: width:30em; border:2px solid #55b05a; margin:1px 0; background:#fff; color:#000;

div.p: W3C ✓ The source code of this SVG is valid
div.div: 日本語: ドイツの国旗
div.p: Please note: There is no law regulation on the exact shades of the German flag, so there may be differences to other versions. If you intend to modify the colors, remember to change these, too:

a.title: File:Flag of East Germany with cut out emblem.svg

li.a: File:Flag of East Germany with cut out emblem.svg

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr;

img.alt: Public domain

div.i: This file depicts the flag of a German Körperschaft des öffentlichen Rechts (corporation governed by public law). According to § 5 Abs. 1 of the German

a.title: de:Gesetz über Urheberrecht und verwandte Schutzrechte

div.i: Note: The usage of flags is governed by legal restrictions, independent of the copyright status of the depiction shown here.

div.div: Deutsch: Dieses Bild stellt die Flagge einer deutschen Körperschaft des öffentlichen Rechts dar. Nach § 5 Abs. 1 UrhG (Deutschland) sind amtliche Werke wie Flaggen gemeinfrei ("public domain"). Flaggen sind allgemein unabhängig von ihrem urheberrechtlichen Status in ihrer Nutzung gesetzlich beschränkt, und den öffentlichen Körperschaften dienen sie darüber hinaus als Hoheitszeichen.

img.alt: Coat of Arms of Germany.svg

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction:ltr;

td.span: This image shows a flag, a coat of arms, a seal or some other official insignia. The use of such symbols is restricted in many countries. These restrictions are independent of the copyright status.

span.small: This tag does not indicate the copyright status or the source of the attached work. A normal copyright tag and a source are still required. See Commons:Licensing for more information.

p.span: Alemannisch | Boarisch | Български | Català | Česky | Dansk | Deutsch | Ελληνικά | English | Esperanto | Español | Eesti | Euskara | Suomi | Français | Hrvatski | Magyar | Bahasa Indonesia | Italiano | 日本語 | ქართული | 한국어 | Lietuvių | Македонски | മലയാളം | Plattdüütsch | Nederlands | Polski | Português | Română | Русский | ไทย | Українська | Vèneto | Tiếng Việt | 中文 | ‪中文(简体)‬ | ‪中文(繁體)‬ | 粵語 | +/−

div.p: Click on a date/time to view the file as it appeared at that time.

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 18:28, 26 September 2007

td.span: (letting the stripes overlap to avoid transparency effects after scaling down to small sizes)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 12:04, 29 July 2007
Thumbnail for version as of 06:09, 4 June 2007
Thumbnail for version as of 18:32, 20 August 2006

td.span: (better code to avoid white stripes after scaling...)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 18:28, 20 August 2006

td.span: (code to avoid white stripes after scaling)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 04:28, 22 April 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 16:25, 20 March 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 16:16, 9 February 2006

td.span: (Using the Pantone approximations, see discussion; scaled to 2x)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:30, 5 February 2006

td.span: (Wrote this using SVG code, colors from the latest image)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 06:07, 5 February 2006
Thumbnail for version as of 19:15, 1 February 2006

td.span: (officially specified colours: RAL 9017 for black, RAL 3020 for red and RAL 1028 for yellow)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 23:25, 29 November 2005

td.span: (Changed the gold strip to #ffc709. CMYK C 0, M 10, Y 100, K 0 is not #ffe500, and the page qouted by User:Dbenbenn says, that this strip has a tone between CMYK C 0, M 10, Y 100, K 0 and CMYK C 0, M 35, Y 100, K 0. #ffc709 is CMYK C 0, M 22, Y 100, K )

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 23:59, 30 September 2005

td.span: (change gold stripe to ffe500 according to http://www.fotw.net/flags/de_color.html, CMYK 0,10,100,0. Changes are PD.)

img.alt: Thumbnail for version as of 22:07, 28 September 2005
Thumbnail for version as of 22:53, 27 September 2005

td.span: (The flag of Germany. Source: Drawn by User:SKopp {{Template:Insignia}} Category:Flags of Germany)
